text.h2: Yeaa ... My Page Is Still Working in [year] !!
text.pLead: In this repository - and on the following React.js app - I publish my graphics made in pixel art style.
text.p: The graphics are used across my other projects. My aim is to store the xcf-s in the docs, to bookmark the best free tutorials to make pixel art and of course a new excuse for creating another React.Js app with the help of Bootstrap 4 :) The first pixel graphic I made:

text.h2: I draw this girl for the first character not to feel that lonely
text.pLead: The second pixel art I made. Nothing special: a girl (bit taller than the first character) drawn in pixels.
text.p: The drawing was made with Gimp on a 50 x 50 pixel grid just for fun, it was not published elsewhere.
This is a drawing of an oldschool computer (286 PC). Sometimes I feel my i5 laptop is slower than these machines were...

text.pLead: Edward the Mild is a character made for side scroller game for later usage.
text.p: Current image is a frame of a sprite sequence for pixel art-style side scroller. The drawing was done in Gimp with brushs on multiple colour layers, then it was pixelized with the usual 50 x 50 grid method.
